hp_raw: 140 ( fast healing 10 , mental rebirth,  negative healing )
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Vetalarana Manipulator](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1912)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A vetalarana manipulator is a gifted strategist, empowered by the memories, thoughts, and talents the manipulator has drained from countless victims and honed by centuries of survival. Certain of their own superiority, manipulators twist free-willed individuals for their own ends as easily as they control their comatose puppets.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Vampire_VetalaranaManipulator.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Vetalarana Manipulator](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1912)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Vampire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=242" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 163</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), thoughtsense (precise) 100 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet, [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +24, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +23, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +6

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +7
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +24 

</row>

**HP** 140
([fast healing 10](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15), mental rebirth, [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [_sleep_](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

**Resistances**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) 10, physical 10 (except [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375))

**Weaknesses**
vetalarana vulnerabilities

**Psychic Superiority** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Trigger** A creature targets the vetalarana manipulator with a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect or spell; **Effect** The manipulator psychically lashes out at the triggering creature, dealing 3d8 mental damage (DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 3d8+10 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) and paralyzing claws

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 30
- **Constant (5th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Occult Prepared Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45) (×2), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (×2)
- **3rd**
[False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=156), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)
- **4th**
[Agonizing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=665), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315), [Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329)
- **5th**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193), [Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87) (×2), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273)

**Control Comatose**  ([Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Possession](/Traits.aspx?ID=129)) 

**Drain Thoughts** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) When Draining Thoughts, the vetalarana manipulator regains 14 HP.

**Paralyzing Claws**   DC 27

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-311" />
name: Vetalarana Manipulator
